dmca.title: Product Descriptions & Photographs: Copyright & Trademark Issues
dmca.body:
I am still waiting to be contacted by someone from your company regarding
the copyright infringement of one of my product photographs.  Not only did
you use my photograph  and link it to someone else's website you also used
my description. THe person who owns the website, www.elegantconnection.com
does make [products] but they are not custom-made nor are they quilted.
The person who submitted this site also submitted my site to your company
last year. I am requesting that my image and text description "[text description of product]" be removed immediately or I will be contacting my
attorney for a Cease and Desist Order.
